entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is mentioned as the one who has a powerful impact on her Inquisitorial Squad. She is described as having bulging eyes and speaking in a motherly voice.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: Malfoy is mentioned as being part of Umbridge's Inquisitorial Squad. He is described as having a look of eagerness and greed on his face when he sees the situation unfolding.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is mentioned as being contemplated by Umbridge for another long moment before she speaks to her in a motherly voice.

entities.name: potter
entities.description: Potter is mentioned as someone who will be taken along with Hermione and Umbridge.

relationships.description: Umbridge has power over Malfoy, as evident from the way she speaks to him and the fact that he is part of her Inquisitorial Squad.
Umbridge has power over Hermione, as evident from the way she speaks to her in a motherly voice and takes control of the situation.
Umbridge has power over Potter, as evident from the fact that he is being taken along with Hermione and Umbridge.
